34 def test_pain001(self): 

35 debtor_acc = 'FI4947300010416310' 

36 p = Pain001('201802071211XJANITEST', 'Vuokrahelppi', debtor_acc, iban_bic(debtor_acc), '020840699', 

37 ['Koukkukankareentie 29', '20320 Turku'], 'FI') 

38 creditor_acc = 'FI8847304720017517' 

39 p.add_payment('201802071339A0001', 'Jani Kajala', creditor_acc, iban_bic(creditor_acc), Decimal('49.00'), 'vuokratilitys') 

40 p.add_payment('201802071339A0001', 'Jani Kajala', creditor_acc, iban_bic(creditor_acc), Decimal('49.00'), '302300', PAIN001_REMITTANCE_INFO_OCR) 

41 p.add_payment('201802071339A0001', 'Jani Kajala', creditor_acc, iban_bic(creditor_acc), Decimal('49.00'), 'RF92 1229', PAIN001_REMITTANCE_INFO_OCR_ISO) 

42 xml_str = format_xml(p.render_to_bytes().decode()) 

43 # print(xml_str) 

44 

45 filename = '/tmp/pain001.xml' 

46 with open(filename, 'wt') as fp: 

47 fp.write(xml_str) 

48 # print(filename, 'written') 

49 

50 # /usr/bin/xmllint --format --pretty 1 --load-trace --debug --schema $1 $2 

51 res = subprocess.run([ 

52 '/usr/bin/xmllint', 

53 '--noout', 

54 # '--format', 

55 # '--pretty', '1', 

56 # '--load-trace', 

57 # '--debug', 

58 '--schema', 

59 join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/pain001/pain.001.001.03.xsd'), 

60 filename, 

61 ]) 

62 self.assertEqual(res.returncode, 0) 

63 

64 def test_to(self): 

65 filename = join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/to/547404896.TO') 

66 statements = parse_tiliote_statements_from_file(filename) 

67 rec = statements[0]['records'][0] 

68 # pprint(rec) 

69 self.assertEqual(rec['amount'], Decimal('-1799.00')) 

70 self.assertEqual(rec['archive_identifier'], '180203473047IE5807') 

71 self.assertEqual(rec['paid_date'], date(2018, 2, 3)) 

72 self.assertEqual(rec['sepa']['iban_account_number'], 'FI8847304720017517') 

73 

74 def test_svm(self): 

75 filename = join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/svm/547392460.SVM') 

76 batches = parse_svm_batches_from_file(filename) 

77 recs = batches[0]['records'] 

78 self.assertEqual(len(recs), 1) 

79 rec = recs[0] 

80 # pprint(rec) 

81 self.assertEqual(rec['amount'], Decimal('49.00')) 

82 self.assertEqual(rec['archive_identifier'], '02042588WWRV0212') 

83 self.assertEqual(rec['remittance_info'], '00000000000000013013') 

84 

85 def test_xp(self): 

86 filename = join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/xp/547958656.XP') 

87 with open(filename, 'rb') as fp: 

88 file_content = fp.read() 

89 p = Pain002(file_content) 

90 self.assertEqual(p.original_msg_id, '201802071211XJANITEST') 

91 self.assertEqual(p.msg_id, 'V000000009726773') 

92 self.assertEqual(p.group_status, 'ACCP') 

93 self.assertEqual(p.is_accepted, True) 

94 

95 def test_ecb_rates(self): 

96 filename = join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/ecb-rates-2019-08-15.xml') 

97 with open(filename, 'rt') as fp: 

98 content = fp.read() 

99 rates = parse_euro_exchange_rates_xml(content) 

100 # for record_date, currency, rate in rates[20:21]: 

101 # print(record_date, currency, rate) 

102 record_date, currency, rate = rates[20] 

103 self.assertEqual(record_date, date(2019, 8, 15)) 

104 self.assertEqual(currency, 'HKD') 

105 self.assertEqual(rate, Decimal('8.744')) 

106 

107 def normalize_soap_env(self, content: bytes) -> bytes: 

108 doc = etree.fromstring(content) 

109 doc.find('.//{http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#}DigestValue').text = 'x' 

110 doc.find('.//{http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#}Reference').attrib['URI'] = 'x' 

111 doc.find('.//{http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#}SignatureValue').text = 'x' 

112 doc.find('.//{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd}Reference').attrib['URI'] = 'x' 

113 doc.find('.//{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd}BinarySecurityToken').attrib['{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd}Id'] = 'x' 

114 doc.find('.//{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd}BinarySecurityToken').text = 'x' 

115 doc.find('.//{http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/}Body').attrib['{http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd}Id'] = 'x' 

116 return etree.tostring(doc) 

117 

118 def test_x509(self): 

119 print('MEDIA_ROOT = {}'.format(settings.MEDIA_ROOT)) 

120 ws = WsEdiConnection(name='test', sender_identifier='12319203', receiver_identifier='123192031', target_identifier='1', environment='TEST', soap_endpoint='http://localhost') 

121 ws.signing_cert_file.name = 'data/x509/cert.pem' 

122 ws.signing_key_file.name = 'data/x509/key.pem' 

123 ws.save() 

124 cert = get_x509_cert_from_file('data/x509/cert.pem') 

125 not_valid_before, not_valid_after = pytz.utc.localize(cert.not_valid_before), pytz.utc.localize(cert.not_valid_after) 

126 self.assertEqual(not_valid_before, datetime(2019, 12, 3, 17, 54, 41, tzinfo=tzutc())) 

127 self.assertEqual(not_valid_after, datetime(2019, 12, 13, 17, 54, 41, tzinfo=tzutc())) 

128 self.assertEqual(WsEdiConnection.objects.get_by_receiver_identifier('123192031').id, ws.id) 

129 app = open('data/x509/appreq.xml', 'rb').read() 

130 signed = ws.sign_application_request(app)

149 def test_validate_xml(self): 

150 xml = os.path.join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/finvoice/xsd-test.xml') 

151 xsd = os.path.join(settings.BASE_DIR, 'data/finvoice/xsd-test.xsd') 

152 with open(xml, 'rb') as fp: 

153 validate_xml(fp.read(), xsd)

155 def test_payout_validation(self): 

156 payer = PayoutParty.objects.all().first() 

157 recipient = PayoutParty.objects.all().last() 

158 connection = WsEdiConnection.objects.all().first() 

159 acc = Account.objects.all().first() 

160 p = Payout( 

161 connection=connection, 

162 payer=payer, 

163 recipient=recipient, 

164 messages='testi', 

165 account=acc) 

166 with self.assertRaisesMessage(ValidationError, '> 0'): 

167 p.full_clean() 

168 

169 def test_rsa_csr(self): 

170 pk = create_private_key() 

171 csr = create_csr_pem(pk, common_name='kajala.com', country_name='FI', organization_name='Kajala Group Ltd') 

172 self.assertEqual(csr.decode().split('\n')[0], '-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----') 

173 pk_pem = get_private_key_pem(pk) 

174 self.assertEqual(pk_pem.decode().split('\n')[0], '-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----') 

175 self.assertFalse(strip_pem_header_and_footer(pk_pem).startswith(b'-----BEGIN')) 

176 

177 def test_parse_xt(self): 

178 if os.path.isdir('./downloads/xt'): 

179 call_command('parse_xt', 'downloads/xt', auto_create_accounts=True) 

180 if os.path.isdir('./downloads/svm'): 

181 call_command('parse_svm', 'downloads/svm', auto_create_accounts=True) 

182 call_command('parse_xt', 'data/xt', auto_create_accounts=True) 

183 call_command('parse_svm', 'data/svm', auto_create_accounts=True) 

184 call_command('parse_to', 'data/to', auto_create_accounts=True)
